actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to expedite action on certain permits by the Secretary of the Army.

summary.text: Amends the Refuse Act of 1899, the Federal Water Pollution Control Act, and the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972 to direct the Secretary of the Army to act on applications for permits for discharges under such Acts within 90 days.

titles.title: A bill to expedite action on certain permits by the Secretary of the Army.
